Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red pottery vessel, the fabric is partially light-brown in section, the exterior is covered with a pale red-brown slip and remains of at least thirteen lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393839) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393839)
